short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates filling out the portal feedback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your faculty feedback submission process with our Chrome extension. Say goodbye to tedious manual input - effortlessly fill out the feedback form with just a click. Customize your ratings and breeze through each question, enhancing your browsing experience. No more repetitive clicks, just efficient feedback submission at your fingertips.
